website_summaries.verdict: Choose this good-looking model if you use a lengthy hose and have ample space for it's large design.
pros: Retracts with a hand-cranked mechanism that's straightforward to use
Can hold as much as 225 feet of hose and includes several feet of connection hose
cons: While it looks good, it's large and takes up quite a bit of space
Swivel base isn't very stable and tends to wobble

customer_reviews.title: Best Hose Reel ever
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hose reel in 2011 for my pool deck. It was still in excellent order when we moved last year. This year it developed a problem and I figured it was a goner. I patiently pulled out the 100ft of hose and found the connection point inside was leaking. I verified it wasn't the hoses or outside connectors. Put it all back together and it is off and working perfectly. I'm a Gardener and have bought many reels over the years. this is the best ever.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE!
customer_reviews.text: There really weren't too many options for a 200' hose reel under $100. We had high hopes, but soon found out just how cheaply this product is made. We didn't even use the full 225' capacity yet the inner plastic reel (horizontal) cracked right at the connection to the reel flange (vertical). We maintained it well and kept it out of the sun. It's just a lousy product, though convenient until it broke.
customer_reviews.author: Felonius Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Stay Away from plastic hose connections
customer_reviews.text: The hose output connection is made of plastic and not threaded to be leakproof. I tested many different hose connections on the Suncast, all leaked but not anywhere else.. Very disappointing to learn that similar Suncast hose reels at Home Depot are equipped with metal output hose connections. Now that makes sense. Don’t bother with the cheap plastic version.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie Rose

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME! Finally one that lasts!
customer_reviews.text: We love it! We went through a bunch of these hose rollers, from lowes, to home depot . . . from cheap ones to expensive ones, they always end up rusting or cracking and falling apart. Well . . . we've had this one for a while now and I must say this maybe the last one we ever have to buy. The rolling system is smooth, and the fact that it rotates allows us to keep it in a corner and string the hose through a couple of bushes and pull straight without destroying anything. It does require to be fastened down to work effectively though. A large gardent paver and a few tapcons took care of that.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard Martinage

customer_reviews.title: Manages my 100' hose well. Slide-Trak Hose Guide makes it a breeze to reel the hose in
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product. I don't use it to its fullest (I have only a 100' hose), but it's make the task of using the hose often, for small jobs, incredibly easy. Finishing the job is so easy with the "Slide-Trak Hose Guide", it coils the hose properly when I turn the crank as fast as I can. The storage compartment is convenient. I ordered it with the storage compartment because it has a shorter lead time for delivery. The swivel base is a little clunky: you have to apply a fair amount of force to make it "unlock". I find it just as easy to rotate the entire reel while leaving the swivel locked. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: LeoG49

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware! Will cost more than item price to return.
customer_reviews.text: Buyer BEWARE! If you order this and don’t like it, it’ll cost you more than you pay for the item to ship it back. I failed to notice the size/dimensions and this Ian a very large hose cart. My bad, but now I’m stuck with them because it’s by over $90 each to ship back. Do not order unless you’re 100% this is the right item for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying.
customer_reviews.text: When I received this the box was damaged and the handle was jammed. I didn't contact the seller because it still is useable and I wasn't concerned about the handle being able to fold properly. Not only that, but it would have come in the same packaging and would be just as likely to have the same thing happen any way. It is a little heavy even without a hose in it, but I am fine with that too. For the most part it is a great hose box that conceals and provides a place for my hose.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Kollasch

customer_reviews.title: It's just ok. Needs improvements.
customer_reviews.text: Hose does not track in reel as it should. Needs side rollers to keep hose from staging on sides. Inside hose hookup is very cheaply made. Should be more substantial not chintzy. This will be the first thing to break. I may beef it up myself to avoid problems. The top bin is very handy. Some hose fitting have difficult going thru hose guide.
customer_reviews.author: Ron P.

customer_reviews.title: AVOID THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I would give it a zero if that was an option. 90 days after receiving it and 60 days after hooking it up, the connection from the box to the faucet fell off. I am not able to repair this and apparently am incapable of finding any help from Amazon on this product they sell.
customer_reviews.author: Shana Berry

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: After I put the new hose on and I turned on the water for the first time, the connection on the out side popped right out from the hose reel itself. It would not stay in place if you turned the water on. So I held it in, turned the water on and the hose separated at the connection completely, I had nothing at the other end of the hose, it was completely open so there wasn't any back up pressure. I had if for 3 weeks before I could use it because I ordered new hose to go with it. At least I have the new hose that works. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: garden hose giving you hassles?  Get this to tame it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this hose reel. So much so, this is my third or fourth one. Love the easy winding, which in my advancing years is very much welcomed as each of our garden hoses are 100 footers (one is 3/4 inch heavy duty no less) and this reel makes winding up the hose a breeze. I also like the little storage bin for my extra nozzles and sprinklers. Glad I found this again.
customer_reviews.author: DeepDishorThin

customer_reviews.title: I still like it. It does a good job of winding ...
customer_reviews.text: Have used it for several months now and it's performing as advertised. It replaced an older model that broke on the inside. Unfortunately, there have been no real upgrades in the gear materials and internal parts that would make it last longer. Also, no replacement parts were available for the exact same model without the base swivel. It's plastic and parts are going to break. If they are available, these are not that difficult to repair. I still like it. It does a good job of winding the hose and, if you leave the hose extended straight while retrieving it, the hose doesn't get twisted.
customer_reviews.author: Roy A

customer_reviews.title: I like it !
customer_reviews.text: It arrived last week, the hose was transferred to it from the old one. There are several features that I really like ! First, there’s a guide for the hose to ensure it winds and unwinds smoothly. Secondly ; all of the internal workings are in housed to protect them from wind and dirt. Lastly it holds 250 Feet of hose, I’m up to 150 presently. But anticipate buying more hose so I’m covered !
customer_reviews.author: NYB

customer_reviews.title: Would not but again
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t know this has to be anchored into concrete for my application may work better in dirt or lawn.I think a metal product would be sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: rickeevee

customer_reviews.title: It’s not auto rewind.
customer_reviews.text: It’s not an auto rewind I though it was it’s not clear on the description if it was I would have given a 5 star. I hope the handle last it’s not solid so it can be a problem if it’s breaks.
customer_reviews.author: G. Mirabal

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Did a lot of research on hose storage before I went with the Suncast. Although there were some negative reviews, I decided to try anyway and I have to believe the negative reviews are basically user error. It was very easy to set up and so far I am extremely satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanna

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my hose after my daughter sledgehammered the last hose reel cart, because hose got tangled up. (Really, true story!) This is big enough for my 50 foot hose. It has the guide that the hose winds back up into. The top lifts off for a little storage area, and the base swivels, great for mobility. All in all, this is worth the money. It is heavy duty, fits nice on the side of house, and best of all, my daughter can even wind it back up without cussing! So, spend the extra money, and get something that will last.
customer_reviews.author: Buddysmom03

customer_reviews.title: Great top compartment, not so good swiel
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in June and loaded it with a 50' rubber hose. It swiveled great before the hose was coiled on. We now have to lift it a bit for it to swivel. The top opening with the hose attachment holder is great. All the hose attachments plus sponges to wash the car fit in with room to spare. This served our purpose well and gave it 4 stars because it didn't swivel well. HOWEVER, if it did not have the swivel feature, we still would of been happy with the top compartment and they style of it. A less expensive hose, which may be lighter as well, may allow it to swivel freer.
customer_reviews.author: MLShopper

customer_reviews.title: Wind!
customer_reviews.text: The first gust of wind and the lid broke the weak hinge system. Peak wind for that day was 31 mph. It came with only two pegs, when four are needed to mount to ground securely. Extremely dissatisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Steve J

customer_reviews.title: Worst
customer_reviews.text: Its Plastic , and cheap made. I bought a Hose pipe from amazon, with this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Replacement better than original
customer_reviews.text: We are replacing our old Suncast Hose Hideaway. It has endured for 20-25 years. We really like this design because of the inner storage area under the lid. Great for nozzles and such. The new swivel feature is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Melody S.

customer_reviews.title: Takes a lot of cranking
customer_reviews.text: This works very well. Hose winds easily onto reel with no kinks. Swivel feature makes it even easier since it can be turned so there is not a sharp angle. The one downside is that the handle is geared down so one turn of the handle is only a half turn of the reel or less. So it takes a lot of cranking to roll up the hose. It would be harder to crank with a one to one ratio but still ok I think.
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great.
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this item, but there are a couple things to consider before buying. First, do not expect it to hold 225 feet of 5/8 hose. I carefully wound 200 feet on and it barely fits. Second, Don't expect the swivel base to work if you don't attach it to something. I have it setting on textured concrete and have to "fight" to swivel it. I will try putting a lubricant on the friction surfaces to see if that helps.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthea J. Brockhaus

customer_reviews.title: Not So Sure
customer_reviews.text: The jury is out on this one because my husband got completely frustrated trying to secure the base down with the stakes provided because the holes are so close to the unit you cannot use a hammer to drive them into the ground without scarring up the sides or even being able to hit the darn thing. If your ground is sand maybe it's not a big deal, but with hard ground it's a killer. I've yet to use it because without the stablizer stakes it will move around. Bummer. Seemed like a good idea at the time. UPDATE: THIS PRODUCT BROKE AFTER ONLY 1 YEAR AND A FEW DAYS. Now I am totally dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Rockhound

customer_reviews.title: Not all that
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy construction, states will accommodate 225’ of hose...after winding on a 100’ hose reel almost completely full. Price for product fair.
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: if your using a 75 foot or longer hose you pretty much have to anchor it down or the unit ...
customer_reviews.text: A bit larger than expected. i can fit tons of tools and supplies up top, swivel works well when anchored to the ground, if your using a 75 foot or longer hose you pretty much have to anchor it down or the unit will pull towards the hose when reeling it up.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Contreras

customer_reviews.title: Hose storage unit
customer_reviews.text: The more we use this the more we like it. It is so easy to roll up the hose. It's a breeze to use. We highly recommend this product. We have a large yard and hauling a 100 feet of hose all over the yard can be quite taxing. With the hideaway hose storage unit it makes watering easy. When your done watering you just turn the crank and your garden is neat and tidy. No hose to trip over. No hose for the mower to run over. Try it. It's a great product. It is not difficult to install.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great multi-use hose storage device
customer_reviews.text: Quickly and easily stores our 100 ft garden hose. Automatically spools it as you wind so no twists or knots. Handy storage in top for sprinklers and other supplies. Has held up well to 2 years of southern sun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and very sturdy. Although it recommends you secure it there's really no need to. Works great and reeling is smooth.
customer_reviews.author: km

customer_reviews.title: Better than Expected
customer_reviews.text: Given some of the warnings about poor construction materials and workmanship, I was a bit hesitant to purchase this. I was pleasantly surprised to find that I like it more than the much more expensive metal hose reel that I purchased at the same time from another manufacturer. This is a large item - bigger than what I expected. Reeling in the hoses is smooth and requires minimal effort. The swivel base is a very convenient feature as well.
customer_reviews.author: L. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Best hose reel available!
customer_reviews.text: Works like a champ! I've purchased two of these one year apart. I gave the first one to my In-Laws and ordered the second one for myself since they wouldn't let me steal theirs! Winds up easily, does not tip over, rotates on it's own when pulling hose out, has a convenient storage area up top and doesn't leak! What more could you ask for.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Granberry

customer_reviews.title: smart trak made of plastic
customer_reviews.text: works well all summer, but when I put it away for the winter the base broke off. I was able to fix it, but we will see how it does this year That was 2012, now in 2013 the hose drum has broken after only a few days of use. DO NOT BUY...mine is doing to the dump, waste of money. This is the second suncast I have bought, and it will be the last...they just do not hold up
customer_reviews.author: shoebe

customer_reviews.title: Off Base
customer_reviews.text: The base would not stay attached to the hose cabinet making it impossible to use the hose reel. When I took it out of the shipping box, the swivel was detached. I put the swivel back on, started to carry it outside and whole base fell off. I could not get the base to securely fit to the cabinet. I think it was due to the plastic tabs not being strong enough to secure the base to the cabinet. Not a quality product - lightweight plastic all around.
customer_reviews.author: JMR

customer_reviews.title: Like the one I bought years ago
customer_reviews.text: Like the one I bought years ago, but at half the price. Unlike others, I didn't find this to be any less in weight than the original one. Sits about half the day in sun, and that will take a toll. The last one lasted a long time. Only time will tell. But it is the exact one I had before.
customer_reviews.author: Glen Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Very easy on the roll up of hoses and I am ...
customer_reviews.text: Swivel base makes it nicer but be aware it needs to be anchored down for it to work properly with the swivel base or a very flat surface. Very easy on the roll up of hoses and I am using a 150 ft. Also like the fact of the small compartment on top to hold my watering nozzles and such
customer_reviews.author: Rngr

customer_reviews.title: A great hose reel
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many different types of hose reels and this one is the best. I now own two of these!
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Noce Hose Cart
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice cart. I don't need the swivel feature but it's there if I ever do. I have been using it and am not complaining. It has a nice removable storage bin to keep my extra nozzles and etc.
customer_reviews.author: joeglo

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good looking reel, I like the fact the hose loads from the top of the reel. Storage bin is pretty handy, and the swivel base functions well. The only draw back is the plastic male connection on the hose drum drips, I've replaced the washer, put as much pressure as I dare, and it still drips. Not a deal breaker, just have to remember to turn off the faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Silakoski

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well. It rotates so you can ...
customer_reviews.text: Does the job well. It rotates so you can pull the hose out whichever direction you want. The overall weight is too light for a 100ft hose so you need to secure it properly to ground or it will tip over.
customer_reviews.author: Pawel Bunko

customer_reviews.title: Seems Rugged and Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Been shopping for a hose reel and this had some of the best ratings. So far, the rating hold true--rugged, convenient features, and reliable.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Knutson

customer_reviews.title: Bob
customer_reviews.text: Had the product for six months, no problems. Initial impression was that it was somewhat 'flimsy/light weight' and it is. However it functions as designed and advertised. You will definately have to secure the winder to the patio floor or some sort of solid mounting surface. You may want to drill a couple of drain holes in the interior tray. Winding the hose back is no problem as there is a 'foot step' to hold the winder down but pulling the hose out, if the winder is not secured, it is not heavy enough to stay put.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Keep your hose
customer_reviews.text: Great pricing. Easy to assemble. Holds a lot of hose. Convenient storage space under the lid.
customer_reviews.author: R. Messier

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: Decent unit, but construction is a bit flimsy. The crank itself seems strong, but the base is flimsy and I know the lifespan of this will be short lived. I won't replace it with the same unit when it inevitably breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Dave M

customer_reviews.title: It works as advertised. When rolling the hose up ...
customer_reviews.text: It works as advertised. When rolling the hose up, excess water comes our the hose connection point next to the house. You have to secure the base to the ground in order to take advantage of the swivel feature. It was a bit taller than we expected. The extra height caused it not to blend very well on our patio...so we moved it to the side of the house. Overall, it seems to be working OK....just sure how long it will last in the direct sun/weather and not being under a covering.
customer_reviews.author: Noel Taylor

customer_reviews.title: It holds up will long term
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hose reel in April of 2009, and it works just as well in August of 2018 as it did when it was new. The plastic is a little faded, but not brittle or falling apart. If this thing ever breaks, I'll buy the same one again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Oneal

customer_reviews.title: Happy wife happy life
customer_reviews.text: I like that I can mount it to the ground and it came with everything it needed. Plus my wife is happy with the hose being rolled up.
customer_reviews.author: eric peters

customer_reviews.title: I love this reel
customer_reviews.text: I love this reel. I like the pivot and like the geared down crank, and hose feed. Takes all the hard work out of unreeling and reeling the hose. It seems a little fragile, however. I'm hoping it will last at least a couple of years.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Little larger than expected, but its a good thing.
customer_reviews.text: I'd have to say the best part is the little cubby in the top.
customer_reviews.author: Phill

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find
customer_reviews.text: I have had several of these and love them. The quality and ease of use for this hose caddy exceeds anything I have seen at local hardware outlets. I also love the inside caddy which is difficult to find even on the internet.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Sanders

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with Suncast products
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for a Suncast Hideaway reel that was over ten years old. The old one broke when it fell over on the and landed on the handle. The swivel action and the ability to either screw it down to wood or anchor it to the ground with the furnished spikes will prevent this one from tipping over. I am very happy with Suncast products.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for plastic
customer_reviews.text: includes two spikes and a neat hose winder that goes back and forth as you reel in hose so it doesn't bunch. Wish it had four spikes Would also suggest more natural, matte colors to match houses, this beige is the equivalent of a 90's pc and unless you have plastic siding will scream "made in China" next to your house.
customer_reviews.author: in.formed

customer_reviews.title: Hose Reel Cart
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the Suncast hose reel - larger than we thought it would be, very sturdy, like the automatic reel, our old one didn't have this feature and it really works well. It is best to turn off the water and empty the hose before reeling in. Ours is sitting on the edge of a concrete carport not anchored to anything so it doesn't swivel as easily as it would if we had it anchored to the ground or a wooden surface, but that's not a problem at all. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Suncast swivel Hose Hideaway
customer_reviews.text: Works good if the hose is a soft type hose , rolls up nicely. Hope I get many years use from it.
customer_reviews.author: Frank W

customer_reviews.title: Hose Storage Bin
customer_reviews.text: I love the taller size & it works so smoothly!!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Pilch

customer_reviews.title: Nice but, useless?
customer_reviews.text: Have a problem with the source spigot. It is on the other side of the opening. (did not notice that) Need to figure out how to go about it.
customer_reviews.author: Yago 47

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last even a year
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, it broke 11 months after we purchased it. It is something that just stands there with minimal usage so very poor quality
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work as well as hoped
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive unit to hide the ugly hose. Unfortunately doesn't always wind hose up well and it gets jumbled. Storage tray inside too small to hold sprinkler.
customer_reviews.author: Mowlee

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome to store the garden hose that was always laying all over the lawn!
customer_reviews.author: Sprucerocks

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: This item is so perfect for my yard. The hose is hidden, it's very easy to roll the hose up, and, with the adjusting part, it neatly winds up the hose evenly inside as you roll it up
customer_reviews.author: E. Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: Great Hose Reel
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something exactly like this for a hose reel. Only problem is that it is expensive and it did not come with stakes for you to stake to the ground. Overall hose works well and it hides it away in a nice container. The storage is really useful for different hose heads and some garden tools. If it was cheaper or if they made a little smaller one with storage I would probably buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M. Frasca

customer_reviews.title: I love both of my Suncast
customer_reviews.text: I love both of my Suncast,but I didn't receive the Bin that goes inside of the Suncast for storage..Its very nice in my yard..I did call but it is out of stock.. Thank you, Ms. Cookie
customer_reviews.author: Cookie Cook

customer_reviews.title: Love it, however 3 months into owning it the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it, however 3 months into owning it the swivel (roll up contraption) broke. I have to manually open top and roll it up.
customer_reviews.author: rainedropsonroses

customer_reviews.title: It leaks. Got replacement parts. Unable to get ...
customer_reviews.text: It leaks. Got replacement parts. Unable to get inside reel holder separated to replace parts needed. Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Nola Lotzer

customer_reviews.title: Convenient but hose connections leak
customer_reviews.text: Holds a lot of hose. Not the easiest to rewind though
customer_reviews.author: William Pierson

customer_reviews.title: Nice that there is a compartment on the top so ...
customer_reviews.text: It is ok. Never really owned any hose reel that has been impressive. Will need a level spot if you want the swivel action to work. Nice that there is a compartment on the top so you can throw your hose attachments in there with a lid.
customer_reviews.author: M Brown

customer_reviews.title: Really good product
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use! Easier to roll up our hose than our old one was. The swivel feature is just icing on the cake.
customer_reviews.author: Five feet tall

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs. Box came smashed up, but the product was fine. I would say this is sturdy judging by how the box looked and it isn't cracked or anything. No leaks at all.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bors

customer_reviews.title: This has made my outdoor work so much better. I am not fighting with the dreaded tangled ...
customer_reviews.text: This has made my outdoor work so much better. I am not fighting with the dreaded tangled hose! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Alfie

customer_reviews.title: Works nice
customer_reviews.text: If it's on concrete and you pull the hose, the whole thing will slide around and not stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Abbey

customer_reviews.title: Well made product Matches the other shed/cabinets and deck boxes ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made product Matches the other shed/cabinets and deck boxes that I have from Suncast.
customer_reviews.author: DEAL HUNTER

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well made and functional. VERY bulky, you need SPACE for this. Will report back on how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell L. Dunagan

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea but flemsey
customer_reviews.text: Nice idea but flemsey. When you swivel the unit breaks apart. Only held together with peices snapped together. Winding crank does not rotate in the palm of you hand. For long hose best to use a garden glove.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hicks

customer_reviews.title: OK but not great
customer_reviews.text: This product does what it's supposed to do but it's not of especially good build quality. The moving parts are made of plastic that has a shabby feel. If I could find one that's made with higher quality I would buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Product Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Good Value; smart retrieve nice
customer_reviews.text: Liked everything except for the feed hose which kept leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Deisenroth

customer_reviews.title: I really like it. I like the storage bin which make ...
customer_reviews.text: this was my second order, I really like it. I like the storage bin which make it a five star.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: Now our yard looks neat and tidy. We really like the swivel base which means we can reel in the hose from any direction not just straight ahead. The top comes off for a bin where we store some simple gardening implements. We've had several other type of hose reels and none of them were good. This one is a winner!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great buy over all.
customer_reviews.text: Father's day gift...once Dad put it together he liked the product...enough space for garden hose, top storage compartment, able to turn from the base. He thinks it could be little sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Eufemia M. Armetta

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good buy for the price, I have 200' of 5/8" hose in it and it's holding up great, plenty of space. Should help protect the hose investment.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Broke the first time I turned on the water!
customer_reviews.text: The hose fitting blew out the first time I turned on the water. Don't waste your money. Also, it has plastic treads which I hate.
customer_reviews.author: Sara L

customer_reviews.title: Large Box and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The Box is too big for where I wanted it to replace another hose real. So I put it in another location which is working just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L Potts

customer_reviews.title: Suncast SSB200B Swivel hose hideaway with smart trak
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this hose reel cart. Purchased two of them. Best hose reel carts I have had. Love the smart track system. Don't have to fight with my hose anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Kimber

customer_reviews.title: Works good hard to swivel with 200 feet of hose in ...
customer_reviews.text: Works good hard to swivel with 200 feet of hose in it but much easier than rolling up by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne

customer_reviews.title: Get a washer
customer_reviews.text: This works well with a washer between the hookup on the box and and the one on the house. If you don't use a washer (not included) it will leak and waste water. Overall happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.text: I have three of these. They work great and have storage space for several hose accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Waykuy

customer_reviews.title: Product okay but delivery was rough
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was early but box was damaged and left in the rain. This is on Fed Ex. Haven't had chance to use product yet but seems good. Swivel is a little rough; not sure I would get the swivel again.
customer_reviews.author: Steve S.

customer_reviews.title: Get the bigger heavy duty model
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Suncrest hose reel to replace a worn one at Home Depot. So poorly made I had to return. The Amazon model was better than my old one, exceeding my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: james w. ball

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The hose reel is very good. I have bought many suncast items and have always been pleased with their products. The only complaint I have is the swivel base does not operate as freely as I expected.. Perhaps after it used a while, it will loosen up.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry  B

customer_reviews.title: Best Hose Storage
customer_reviews.text: This hose storage is perfectly easy for retracting hose. One handed use.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope Doughty

customer_reviews.title: Meh!
customer_reviews.text: The concept is good. However the stakes are not long enough to anchor it in our soil, and the unit tips over if the swivel is activated while pulling out the hose. I have to pull the hose straight out of the unit before letting it swivel. Being able to lock the swivel feature would be a design improvement for the company. I would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Rangersport

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware, item didn't come with all parts!!
customer_reviews.text: It didn't come wight the swivel base as advertised. Still works okay for what i need, it is a little more difficult to wind up the hose without the swivel base. I just wish i would have gotten what i ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Roseanne Welke

customer_reviews.title: Keeps hose from tangling on reel
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and use...does a great job of keeping the hose untangled
customer_reviews.author: steve switzer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good solid machine. Swivel has value. Storage bin a bit too small
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Really Well Built
customer_reviews.text: This hose hideaway is the best construction I have used so far. This unit replaced a cheaper but same cost from Home Depot which fell apart after just a few years. In addition, the Smart Trak hose guide really works. This is a very nice unit.
customer_reviews.author: TClark

customer_reviews.title: Storage space.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, wind up really good has a small storage under the lid, just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Burgos

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed and holds up to the weather.
customer_reviews.author: Horacio

customer_reviews.title: Got to have
customer_reviews.text: If you have lots of bulky hose then this is a must have. Works great right out of the box. Lots of hose storage and the swivel base makes it all worth while, no more turning over hose box when trying to get just a little ways around corner of house.
customer_reviews.author: B. Miller

customer_reviews.title: EASY REEL IN OF HOSE
customer_reviews.text: GREAT EASY REEL IN OF HOSE, SEEMS FLIMSY BUT I HAVE HAD NO PROBLEM, GREAT PRICE DID I SAY EASY REEL IN OF HOSE..
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Value
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this just before summer started and it works perfect. We had a deep freeze this winter and I didn't know that the one I had apparently froze and broke. I was shocked at how much these things are; after all it's just a hose reel!!! I found this one and thought it was attractive enough and it seemed to have another feature I wanted which was the swivel and the hose guide system was just perfect so I bought it. The shipping was extremely fast and it came already assembled, which was the bonus for me. I would absolutely recommend this hose reel to anyone and have. I think I have sold 3 others within the neighborhood.
customer_reviews.author: NTXDeerHntr

customer_reviews.title: Quality item
customer_reviews.text: Nice. A little larger than I thought but very nice
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband, he likes it a lot and the price you can't beat.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Oliver

product_meta.title: Suncast Resin Swivel Hose Hideaway and Storage Bin with Hose Guide - Durable Outdoor Automatic Hose Storage Reel with Swivel Base, Crank Handle, Lid, Slide Trak Hose Guide, and Storage - 225' Hose Capacity - Mocha and Taupe
product_meta.description: This Suncast Hose Reel has 225 feet of hose capacity and a swiveling base for multidirectional winding. The swivel Hose Hideaway takes the hassle out of watering that 1/4-acre lot. The base swivels a full 360 degrees for reeling at any angle. Ground stakes are included for optimal stability. And, the unit comes fully assembled, so you get a handy device right out of the box, rather than another assembly project. Suncast's innovative Smart Trak hose guide tracks the hose neatly onto reel, so there are no tangle-ups to wrestle out. A sturdy resin construction keeps the unit from cracking. And, a patented Easy-Link system ensures a watertight connection between hose-reel and hose. Plus, a large storage bin provides place for garden tools, sprinklers, gloves, nozzles, and other accessories!
feature_bullets: DURABLE: Sturdy resin design ensures this garden hose reel lasts throughout the seasons while looking great in your backyard, patio, lawn, and other outdoor space
HOSE GUIDE: Slide-Trak Hose Guide makes winding and unwinding of the garden hose easy and kink-free with the help of the crank handle
TIGHT SEAL: Strong, reinforced seal ensures water-tight connection between reel and hose
SWIVEL BASE: Features 360 degree swiveling base for multidirectional reeling
MEDIUM SIZED: Hose Hideaway measures 21"L x 26"W x 29.75"H and holds up to 225' of hose

specifications.Item model number: Resin Swivel Hose Hideaway and Storage
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars339 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
